pageContent: Objective: To investigate the use of high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) as a salvage therapy in patients with recurrence of localized prostate cancer after external beam radiation (EBRT), brachytherapy, or proton therapy.

metaData.source:
The clinical applications of high intensity focused ultrasound in the prostate
